item.title: OMG. Using flash is the worst way to make a website.
item.description: Seriously. It is killing me. I am rather frustrated. So i was reading russell’s post on flash lite and was like “yippee.. more s60 software for my shiny n70.” and i clicked his fancy link to macromedia.com page to “buy” the software. Well. after filling out 30 goddamn forms and clicking all around this really stupid flash app - i finally got to a place where i can download the file.
